name: NP posts bulk actions
author: Nilesh Pipaliya

sections.description:
WP Posts Bulk Actions is the best WordPress plugin. This WordPress bulk post editor plugin helps you to perform bulk action on WordPress posts. WP Posts Bulk Actions can work with default post types and also with custom post types. This great WordPress plugin can bulk delete WordPress posts, WordPress posts bulk actions, and WordPress posts bulk status updates.

The best thing about this best WordPress plugin “WP Posts Bulk Actions” is you can apply these settings on selective post types. This plugin is so easy to integrate with your WordPress website. Install the plugin and head to WordPress Admin > Tools > WP Post WordPress Bulk Action. And here just select your specific post type.

Features And Options:

  • Users can perform WordPress posts bulk actions.
  • Users can select the post types to add WordPress posts bulk actions
  • Option to bulk delete WordPress posts.
  • WordPress posts status can update in bulk.
  • Support in default and custom post types.

Keywords

wp posts bulk actions, draft, publish, bulk, bulk actions , Custom post type, post , wordpress bulk publish
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the “WP posts bulk actions” plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Click on “Tools” and select “WP posts bulk actions” on the dashboard.
sections.faq:
How Plugin works?

Simply activate the plugin and choose a post type you’d like to bulk update.
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Added link as GOTO ACTION clic to open manage posts/CPT page
  • Fixed bug
  • Tested up to wp version 6.1.1

1.2.0

  • Initial Public Release.

short_description: This plugin allows bulk updating of draft/publish status of posts and custom post type.
